definitions.title: vb.
definitions.body: throw, shoot (NH shoot, Hiph. teach; Aram. Aph. [[אוֹרִי]] teach; Eth. warawa: jecit; Amh. warê is information, news, v. Nö:ZMG 1886, 724; As. ârû, lead, guide, Dl:HWB 241; têrtu, law, Dl:HA 49; Zinj. [[ירי]] set, found, DHM:Sendsch. 57, cf.
infr.—Buhl distinguishes
√ √ [[ירה]]: I. = throw, cf. mod. Ar. warra; II. Hiph. = moisten, cf. [[רוה]]; III. Hiph. = teach, cf. [[ראה]], Ar. r0’y, raway; but evidence for this division hardly sufficient)—
throw, cast, with acc.: cast lots Jos 18:6 (E); army into ([[בְּ]]) the sea Ex 15:4 (song).
cast (= lay, set), corner-stone Job 38:6; pillar Ge 31:51 (E; v. Zinj. supr.)

shoot arrows, abs. Ex 19:13 (E) 2Ki 13:17; acc. of arrows 1Sa 20:36, 1Sa 20:37, Pr 26:18; acc. pers. Nu 21:30 (song, E) Ps 64:5; with [[לְ]] pers. Ps 11:2; [[רִים]]([[וֹ]])[[י]] archers 1Ch 10:3, 2Ch 35:23.
throw water, rain: Ho 6:3, but v. [[יוֹרֶה]] early rain (cf.

definitions.title: Niph.
definitions.body: Impf. [[יִיׇּרֶה]] shot through (with arrows) Ex 19:13 (E).
throw, cast, with [[ל]], into the mire Job 30:19.
shoot (arrows) 1Sa 20:20, 1Sa 20:36, 2Sa 11:20, 2Ki 13:17, 2Ki 19:32 = Is 37:33; with [[ל]], of pers. 2Ch 35:23; acc. pers. Ps 64:5, Ps 64:8; [[מוֹרִים]] archers 1Sa 31:3, 1Sa 31:3, 1Ch 10:3.
throw water, rain: [[וְיוֹרֶה]] [[חֶדֶק לָכֶם]] Ho 10:12 and rain righteousness for you (Thes al. under
); hence [[מוֹרֶה]] early rain (cf.

point out, shew: [[לְהוֹרׂת לְפָנׇיו]] [[גּשְׁנׇה]] Ge 46:28 (J) to point out before him (the way) to Goshen; [[מׂרֶח בְּאֶחְבְּעׂתָיו]] Pr 6:13 pointing out with his fingers; acc. pers. et rei Ex 15:25 (JE) Ps 45:5, Job 6:24.
direct, teach, instruct:

definitions.title: a.
definitions.body: of men, abs. Bezalel in handicraft Ex 35:34 (P); c. acc. pers., a father his son Pr 4:4; the ancients Job Job 8:10; the animals and the earth, the friends of Job 12:7, Job 12:8; c. 2 acc. Is 28:9; [[בּדֶרֶח]] in the way 1Sa 12:23, Ps 25:8, Ps 32:8, Pr 4:11; [[בְּיַד־אֵל]] concerning the hand of Ēl Job 27:11.—[[מוֹרֶה שֶׁקֶר]] teaching lies is used of prophet Is 9:14.

definitions.title: b.
definitions.body: specially of the authoritative direction (v. [[תּוֹרָה]]) given by priests on matters of ceremonial observance, with acc. rei and [[לְ]] pers. De 33:10 (song), they teach thy judgments to Jacob, and thy direction (law) to Israel; double acc. De 17:10, De 17:11 according to the direction, wherewith they direct thee; De 24:8 (on leprosy), Le 10:11 (P), abs. Le 14:57 (P), 2Ch 15:3 [[כּׂהֵן מוֹרֶה]], Ez Eze 44:23 the Zadokite priests [[את־עמי יׁרוּ]] [[בֵּין קׂדֶשׁ לְחׂל]]; Mic 3:11 the priests give such ‘direction&rs for hire; less, technically, of Moses Ex 24:12 (E), of Jehoiada 2Ki 12:3, of the Samaritan priests 2Ki 17:27, 2Ki 17:28.

definitions.title: c.
definitions.body: of God: c. acc. pers. Is 28:26, Ps 119:102; double acc. Ex 4:12, Ex 4:15 (J), Ju Jdg 13:8, Job 34:32, 1Ki 8:36 (= [[אֶל הַדֶּרֶח]] 2Ch 6:27), Ps 27:11, Ps 86:11, Ps 119:33; acc. pers. [[בְּדֶרֶח]] Ps 25:12; [[מִדְּרָכָיו]] of his ways Is 2:3 = Mic 4:2.

definitions.title: d.
definitions.body: of idol-image Hb Hab 2:18 ([[מוֹרֶה שָָׁקֶר]]), v:Hab 2:19.
